original_title: Disney's Sing-Along Songs: CIrcle of Life
overview: Sing, dance, and play along with your favorite Disney songs! It's fun and easy as you read the on-screen lyrics and join your favorite characters in their most memorable musical moments!  Disney presents two show-stopping songs from the smash hit movie, The Lion King-the endearing "Circle of Life" and the rip-roaring "I Just Can't Wait to Be King". But there's even more to sing about! The circle of sing-along fun includes unforgettable songs from The Aristocats, Aladdin, Pinocchio, and others!
title: Disney's Sing-Along Songs: CIrcle of Life
